trans-unit.source: Processes XAML markup from XML files by using an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> intermediary, and produces a XAML node stream.
trans-unit.target: Prosesser XAML markup fra XML-filer ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>mellomliggende, og produserer en XAML node-dataflyt.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: When you construct a XamlXmlReader, an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is required.
trans-unit.target: Når du lage en XamlXmlReader en <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>kreves.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this design is to use established [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] APIs for XML processing in order to handle stream input, to obtain a stream from a file, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Formålet med denne utformingen er å bruke opprettet [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewk](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-netframewk-md.md)] API-er for for XML-behandling for å behandle dataflyten inndata, laster du ned en dataflyt fra en fil, og så videre.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is the first component of the standard load path for XAML operations and is incorporated by <xref:System.Xaml.XamlServices.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName> as well as by several existing framework XAML implementations for loading XAML.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>er den første komponenten for standard Last inn banen til XAML operasjoner og bygges av <xref:System.Xaml.XamlServices.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName>i tillegg som av flere eksisterende framework XAML implementeringer for å laste inn XAML.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlServices.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader"></xref> class, based on a stream.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader"> </xref> klasse, basert på en dataflyt.

trans-unit.source: The initial stream to load into the reader.
trans-unit.target: Den opprinnelige dataflyten skal lastes inn i leseren.

trans-unit.target: streamis .

trans-unit.target: textReaderis .

trans-unit.target: Navnet på XML-filen for å laste inn.

trans-unit.target: fileNameis .

trans-unit.source: Initializing with this constructor also sets a default XAML schema context and default reader settings.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer med denne konstruktøren også angir en kontekst som standard XAML skjema og leseren standardinnstillinger.

trans-unit.target: xmlReaderis .

trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader"> </xref> klasse, basert på en dataflyt med XAML innstillinger.

trans-unit.source: Initializing with this constructor attempts to merge some of the settings from the default reader together with the XAML-specific settings in `settings`.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer med denne konstruktøren prøver å slå sammen noen av innstillingene fra standard leseren sammen med XAML-spesifikke innstillingene i `settings`.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReaderSettings>

trans-unit.source: xmlReader or schemaContext is .
trans-unit.target: xmlReaderor schemaContext is .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether line information is available.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om informasjon er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: This property is part of the <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlLineInfo> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er en del av den <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlLineInfo>implementeringen.</xref:System.Xaml.IXamlLineInfo>

trans-unit.source: The result is partially based on the reader settings that were used to initialize this <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: Resultatet er delvis basert på leseren innstillingene som ble brukt til å initialisere <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if line information is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis informasjon er tilgjengelig. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that reports whether the reader position in the XAML node stream is at end-of-file.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som rapporterer om leseren posisjonen i XAML noden dataflyten er på slutten av filen.

trans-unit.source: If you are currently using a subtree reader, the subtree reader reports IsEof after exiting the bounds of the subtree.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du bruker for øyeblikket undertre leseren, rapporterer undertre leseren IsEof når du avslutter grensene for undertreet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.ReadSubtree%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.ReadSubtree%2A>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.ReadSubtree%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the position is at the conceptual end-of-file in the node stream; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis posisjonen er under den begrepsmodellen slutten av filen i node-strømmen; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the line number to report.
trans-unit.target: Henter linjenummeret rapporten.

trans-unit.source: This property is part of the <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlLineInfo> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er en del av den <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlLineInfo>implementeringen.</xref:System.Xaml.IXamlLineInfo>

trans-unit.source: Node types of <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>, or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType> can return a line number.
trans-unit.target: Nodetyper <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>, eller <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>kan returnere et linjenummer.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>

trans-unit.source: Other node types return a value of 0.
trans-unit.target: Andre typer returnerer verdien 0.

trans-unit.source: All node types return 0 if <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.HasLineInfo%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Alle typer returnerer 0 Hvis <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.HasLineInfo%2A>er `false`.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.HasLineInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: The line number to report.
trans-unit.target: Linjenummeret rapporten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the line position to report.
trans-unit.target: Henter linje posisjonen rapporten.

trans-unit.source: This property is part of the <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlLineInfo> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er en del av den <xref:System.Xaml.IXamlLineInfo>implementeringen.</xref:System.Xaml.IXamlLineInfo>

trans-unit.source: Node types of <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>, or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType> can return a line position.
trans-unit.target: Nodetyper <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>, eller <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>kan returnere en linjeposisjon.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>

trans-unit.source: Other node types return a value of 0.
trans-unit.target: Andre typer returnerer verdien 0.

trans-unit.source: All node types return 0 if <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.HasLineInfo%2A> is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Alle typer returnerer 0 Hvis <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.HasLineInfo%2A>er `false`.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.HasLineInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: The line position to report.
trans-unit.target: Linje posisjonen rapporten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current member at the reader position, if the current reader position is on a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende medlem posisjonen leseren hvis posisjonen i leseren er på en <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeType"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The current member; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the current reader position is not on a member.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende medlem; eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, hvis posisjonen i leseren ikke er i et medlem.

trans-unit.source: Gets the XAML namespace from the current node.
trans-unit.target: Henter navneområdet XAML fra den gjeldende noden.

trans-unit.source: This property only has a non-null result if the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.NodeType%2A> of the current position is <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har bare en ikke-null-resultatet hvis <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.NodeType%2A>gjeldende posisjon er <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.NodeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property does not report the XAML namespace that applies to objects or members in a general scoping sense.
trans-unit.target: XAML-navneområdet som gjelder for objekter eller medlemmer i en områdemaskinen oversikt rapporterer ikke at denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: Your implementation should cache XAML namespace information if you need it for specific operations.
trans-unit.target: Implementeringen skal bufre XAML navneområdet informasjon om du trenger det for bestemte operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: For default operations that involve the loaded XAML schema context, the acting XAML namespace is internally cached by XAML writer implementations.
trans-unit.target: For standard operasjoner som involverer den innlastede XAML skjemaet sammenhengen aktive XAML navneområdet hurtigbufres internt av XAML writer-implementeringer.

trans-unit.source: The XAML namespace from the current node, if it is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: XAML-navneområdet fra den gjeldende noden, hvis den er tilgjengelig. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Henter typen for den gjeldende noden.

trans-unit.source: A value of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeType"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Verdien av <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeType"> </xref> opplisting.

trans-unit.source: Provides the next XAML node from the loaded source, if a XAML node is available.
trans-unit.target: Gjør den neste XAML noden fra innlastet kilden om en XAML node er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: A node where Read returns `false` also returns `true` for <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.IsEof%2A>.
trans-unit.target: En node der leses returnerer `false` returnerer også `true` for <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.IsEof%2A>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.IsEof%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling Read generally has the side effect of advancing the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.LineNumber%2A> or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.LinePosition%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller lese vanligvis er at for å flytte den <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.LineNumber%2A>eller <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.LinePosition%2A>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.LinePosition%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.LineNumber%2A>

trans-unit.source: The next operation after calling Read and getting a `true` result is typically to check <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.NodeType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Neste operasjon etter kaller lese og får en `true` resultatet er vanligvis til å kontrollere <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.NodeType%2A>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.NodeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about XAML node stream concepts, see [Understanding XAML Node Stream Structures and Concepts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om XAML noden dataflyten konsepter [forstå XAML noden dataflyten strukturer og konsepter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a node is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en node er tilgjengelig. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that provides schema information for the information set.
trans-unit.target: Henter et objekt som gir skjemainformasjon for settet med opplysninger.

trans-unit.source: This value is either the default XAML schema context or a specifically derived XAML schema context that is provided as constructor information.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien er standard XAML skjemaet konteksten eller en spesielt avledede XAML skjemaet kontekst som er angitt som konstruktøren informasjon.

trans-unit.source: Schema context affects many aspects of XAML processing behavior.
trans-unit.target: Skjemaet konteksten påvirker mange aspektene av XAML behandling.

trans-unit.source: In particular, the SchemaContext of the reader is generally used by any associated writer.
trans-unit.target: Spesielt brukes vanligvis SchemaContext i leseren av eventuelle tilknyttede skriveren.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides schema information for the information set.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som gir skjemainformasjon for settet med opplysninger.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"> </xref> for den gjeldende noden.

trans-unit.source: This property only has a non-null result if the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.NodeType%2A> of the current position is <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har bare en ikke-null-resultatet hvis <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.NodeType%2A>gjeldende posisjon er <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlReader.NodeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref> of the current node; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the position is not on an object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"> </xref> for den gjeldende noden; eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, hvis posisjonen ikke er et objekt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the current node.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdien for den gjeldende noden.

trans-unit.source: The value of the current node; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the position is not on a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeType"></xref> node type.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for den gjeldende noden. eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, hvis posisjonen er på en <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeType"> </xref> nodetype.
